entry.title: 2020 April Fool's Puzzle Competition Is Now LIVE
entry.summary:
We are happy to present the 2020 #ircpuzzles April Fool's Puzzle Competition on freenode! It has begun!

The first clue is: V2VEb250TGV0Q09WSUQxOVJ1aW5BRlA=

The theme this year is, Ancient Cultures & Mythology

This year, the first channel is, #ircpuzzles-2020-afpc-level01

Except for Level 01, all spaces and dashes are to be replaced with …
entry.content:
We are happy to present the 2020 #ircpuzzles April Fool's Puzzle Competition on freenode! It has begun!

The first clue is: V2VEb250TGV0Q09WSUQxOVJ1aW5BRlA=

The theme this year is, Ancient Cultures & Mythology

This year, the first channel is, #ircpuzzles-2020-afpc-level01

Except for Level 01, all spaces and dashes are to be replaced with "_" (no quotes) for the channel key.

Please join us in #ircpuzzles on freenode.

Tips on how to play are available at: https://blog.ircpuzzles.org/tips.html.

entry.title: 2020 April Fool's Puzzle Competition
entry.content:
The 2020 #ircpuzzles' April Fool's Puzzle Competition will begin on 2020-04-01 00:01 UTC!

We will announce the first clue in #ircpuzzles on chat.freenode, on our website, and on our Twitter handle @ircpuzzles.

entry.title: 2019 April Fool's Puzzle Competition Is Now LIVE
entry.content:
We are happy to present the 2019 IRCPuzzles April Fool's Puzzle Competition on freenode! It has begun!

The first clue is: WW91dmVGb3VuZFRoZUtleQo=

The first channel is #ircpuzzles-afpc2019-level01 and all subsequent channels are in the same format with increasing level numbers.

Please join us in #ircpuzzles on freenode.

entry.title: 2018 April Fool\'s Puzzle Competition
entry.content:

entry.title: 2017 April Fool\'s Day (AFD) Competition
entry.summary:
Glad 2016 is over? Well, we are happy to present the 2017 IRCPuzzles April Fool's Day Challenge on freenode! It will begin at 2017-04-01 12:00 UTC (noon).

The first clue for Level 0 will be released in #ircpuzzles on freenode and on our Twitter page, @ircpuzzles.

Join us in …
entry.content:
Glad 2016 is over? Well, we are happy to present the 2017 IRCPuzzles April Fool's Day Challenge on freenode! It will begin at 2017-04-01 12:00 UTC (noon).

The first clue for Level 0 will be released in #ircpuzzles on freenode and on our Twitter page, @ircpuzzles.

Join us in #ircpuzzles on freenode.net and chat with everybody before, during, and even after the comptetition!

Good luck!

entry.title: Announcement: 2016 Competition!
entry.summary:
We are happy to present the 2016 IRCPuzzles April Fool's Day Challenge on freenode! It will begin at 2016-04-01 12:00 UTC (noon).

The first clue for Level 0 will be released at least on our Twitter page of @ircpuzzles. It may also be released or announced via the freenode …
entry.content:
We are happy to present the 2016 IRCPuzzles April Fool's Day Challenge on freenode! It will begin at 2016-04-01 12:00 UTC (noon).

The first clue for Level 0 will be released at least on our Twitter page of @ircpuzzles. It may also be released or announced via the freenode blog, freenode's twitter page @freenodestaff, freenode wallop, or freenode global announcement.

Join us in #ircpuzzles on freenode.net and chat with everybody before, during, and even after the comptetition!

The prizes for completing this year have yet to be finalized and will most likely be group cloaks representing individual placement in the contest.

Good luck!
